definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: In the new century, the relations between the two parties and countries have made new headway.
sentences.chinese: 进入新世纪，中越两党两国关系又取得了新的发展。

sentences.english: Badawi agreed with Jia's comments and proposals on bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 巴达维赞同贾庆林对两国关系的评价和提出的建议。

sentences.english: Hu said recent years have witnessed all-round and in-depth development of bilateral ties.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，近些年来，中委两国关系全面深入发展。

sentences.english: Tanayev agreed to the comments and proposals of Wen on relations between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 塔纳耶夫赞同温家宝对两国关系的评价和建议。

sentences.english: The dark clouds hanging over the relations between the two countries will quickly vanish.
sentences.chinese: 笼罩着两国关系的阴云会迅速消散。

sentences.english: Over the 10 years since the establishment of diplomatic ties, the bilateral relations have been developing steadily.
sentences.chinese: 建交10年来，两国关系稳步发展。

sentences.english: Hu Jintao said that since the establishment of diplomatic ties, relations between the two countries have been developing steadily.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中葡建交以来，两国关系稳步发展。

sentences.english: During the 8 years since the establishment of diplomatic relations between China and Belarus, the general development of bilateral relations has been at a satisfactory level.
sentences.chinese: 中白建交八年来，两国关系的总体发展水平令人满意。

sentences.english: The two leaders hope to warm up relations between the countries.
sentences.chinese: 这两位领导人希望两国关系变好。

sentences.english: But in recent years, China-Japan relation appears the phenomenon of hot economy and cool politics.
sentences.chinese: 但近年来，两国关系出现了“经热政冷”的局面。

sentences.english: This sentence, of course, comes at a time when US-North Korean relations are already tense.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这次审判的时间正值美朝两国关系紧张之时。

sentences.english: China-Luxembourg ties have progressed smoothly since the two countries established diplomatic ties 34 years ago, Hu said.
sentences.chinese: 胡锦涛说，中卢建交34年来，两国关系顺利发展。

sentences.english: Albert II fully agreed with Hu on his remarks over bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔贝二世表示完全同意胡锦涛对两国关系的评价。

sentences.english: Speaking after the meeting Mr. Obama said it'd be the beginning of a new process in US-Russian relations.
sentences.chinese: 会后奥巴马先生说这将是美俄两国关系新进程的开端。

sentences.english: New Zealand is satisfied with the continuous development of bilateral relations.
sentences.chinese: 新方对两国关系的不断发展感到满意。

sentences.english: There has been an appreciable shift in the past week.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的一周，两国关系发生了相当大的转变。

definition: summit talks/discussion between heads of state
